column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=He coined a philosophy for a terrorist .
#Text=Like ‘ Trotskyite ’ -- there never really existed this phrase " Osama bin Ladenist . "
#Text=Do you think it elevated bin Laden ?
#Text=Yeah , it was so bizarre .
#Text=He was selling Why Orwell Matters at the time .
#Text=With that book they were trying to reorient Orwell away from this Cold War model .
#Text=I do n't know if they can do it , really .
#Text=They 've done so much damage to his canon .
#Text=I do n't know if they can shift it out of a sort of Cold War emphasis .
#Text=Maybe they can .
#Text=The idea that Snowball brings capitalism to the farm -- we see the pitfalls there -- it 's anathema to a sort of CIA model of the Cold War .
#Text=But they 've got to change it , because the Cold War is over .
#Text=But the thinking is there .
#Text=Right after the Soviet Union ended -- you could sense it , you could feel it in the air -- this " Who do we set our sights on ? "
#Text=I think that all of us felt that way to a degree , if not just because we were socialized to think that way .
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=I think that 's what they were trying to do , to by --
#Text=Denouncing ‘ Islamofascism ’ ...
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=I think that there 's a little bit of that .
#Text=I do n't know if it 's quite as transparent as it was with the Cold War , the Dark Empire model , but it 's still there .

#Text=Do you think it 's a little bit trying to fit a square peg through a round hole , like the old paradigm of the Soviet Union as the evil empire , and now the evil empire is this very disparate range of peoples from Indonesia to Iran and trying to make them into a ‘ Soviet Union ? ’
#Text=Yeah , it 's a tough sell .
#Text=But they 're doing it , they 're all over it over there .
#Text=It 's worked .
#Text=It 's sold .
#Text=Yeah , they 're doing it .
#Text=I ca n't even believe how much money they 've spent over there .
#Text=They are going to be spending a lot more ; it 'll be a trillion dollar war .
#Text=Yeah , and that 's the other thing : this whole idea that we 're in this capitalist country .
#Text=We 're not really in a capitalist country ; we 're in something else .
#Text=Because if it were pure capitalism , then these decisions would be terrible decisions .
#Text=That 's why Ron Paul is so interesting .
#Text=Because he 's up there just with steam coming out of his ears , saying , " We 're spending too much money !
